Action.name: download-and-install-hbase
Action.command: useradd hbase; mkdir -p /opt/hbase; cd /opt/hbase; curl -o hbase-0.94.0.tar.gz http://vm-37-00.dice.cluster/tarballs/hbase-0.94.0.tar.gz; tar xvzf hbase-0.94.0.tar.gz; chown -R hbase:hbase /opt/hbase; rm -f /opt/hbase/hbase-0.94.0/lib/hadoop-*.jar
